rukus.text: eoneunal hananimkkeseo man-won-ingalago jiog-e mul-euni ajig deohayeo eul jaga issnaikka lago malhadeola
geuleona uiloun jadeul-egeneun chingug-i meolji ani haess-euni
igeos-eun chamhoehayeo hananimkke gwiuihago geubun-ui yulbeob-eul junsuhaneun-uiloun jadeul-ege yagsogdoen geos-imyeo
boiji anihamyeo jaaelousinhananim-eul dulyeowo hamyeo geubunkke heon sinhaneun jadeul-eul wihan geos-ini
pyeon-anhi geuligo anjeonhage geu gos-e deul-eogala igeos-i yeongsaeng-ui nal ila
geugos-eneun geudeul-i wonhaneun mo deun geos-i iss-eumyeo hananim gyeot-eneun deomanh-eun geos-i issnola

hananim-eun geudeul ijeon geudeul boda ganghayeossdeon sedaedeul-eul geudeul-ui joe ag-eulo malmiam-a eolmana manh-i myeol mangke hayeossneunyo geuttae geudeul-eun jisang eul banghwanghayeoss-euna geudeul-i pihal gos i iss-eossdeonyo
sillo i an-eneun ma-eum-eul ga jinjawa gwileul giul-in jawa geuligo jinsildoege gwanchalhaneun jaleul wihan gyo hun-i issnola
hananim-eun haneulgwa daejiwa geu deul saiui modeun geos-eul yug-ilgan-e changjohasim-e jogeumdo pigonhaji anihaessnola
geuleomeulo geudeul-i malhaneun geos e geudaeneun innaehala geuligo haega tteugijeon-e geuligo haega jigijeon-e geudae junim-eul chan-yanghala
bamjung-edo geuligo yebaeleul deu lin huedo hananim-eul chan-yanghala
geuligo meolji anhneun gos-eulo buteo iss-eul cheonsaui buleum-e gwileul gi ul-ila
geudeul-i jinliui solileul deudge doel geunal-i balo buhwal-ui nal-i doe lila
hananim-i saengmyeong-eul jusa saengmyeong eul as-agani choehuui mogjeogjineun geu bun-isila
daejiga gallajineun nal geudeul-eun seodulleo nawa dahamkke moinani geugeos-i hananimkke swiun geos-ila
hananim-eun geudeul-i malhaneun modeun geos-eul algo issnani geudaeneun geudeul-ege gang-yohaneun ja anila geuleo meulo hananim-ui gyeong-goleul dulyeowo ha neun jadeul-ege i kkulan-eul nangsonghala
